accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on colored backgrounds meets APCA standards. Use text-shadow for text over images.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Update index.css to set the root variables for the dark theme. Ensure 'dark' class is applied to html/body.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, strip the default 'bg-background' and replace with 'bg-slate-900/50' or glassmorphism classes for a custom look.
5. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the dashboard. Avoid simple vertical stacks.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
